title: Fort Wayne man sentenced to 85 years for Werling Drive murder, also a 'person of interest' in other
author: FOX 55 News Fort Wayne
description:
A Fort Wayne man was sentenced to serve 85 years in prison Friday for gunning down another man inside his home. 
In July an Allen County jury found 22-year-old Trenton Fye guilty of murdering 28-year-old Kenneth Jerome Frierson II.
